title: germinate peppers
description:
Need 15 plants.
Assume 50% germination rate and plant 30 seeds.

meta.block_note: Need to clear tables in garage

title: germinate onions
description:
Need 105 plants.
Refer to this guide: https://www.theseasonalhomestead.com/how-to-grow-onions-from-seeds/

Choose one of these: https://www.johnnyseeds.com/vegetables/onions/?prefn1=disease_resistance_codes&prefv1=Fusarium+Basal+Rot%7CPink+Root&prefn2=prod_feature_cat_ref&prefv2=182

title: clean up hardware cloth in yard
description:
If keeping, put it in the shipping crate.
Else, put it in trash.

cut up all branches in yard

Fix delete task problem in kanboard
description: If one task depends on another but I delete it, the other task still will say "remedy for: blah", even though blah is deleted.

title: Put up new ropes in chicken run
Fix dependency language in kanban board
Fertilise corn with urine mix
description:
1 part urine, 9 parts water. Give each corn plant ~133 ml of the mix. 
1.1 litres of urine needed total.

title: fertilise corn row
description:
For each 30 ft row:
3 lb lime 
2 lb bonemeal
2 lb langbeinite
All the compost
Broadfork it in.

Or, use 1 lb of SoP instead of langbeinite.
